heading: HR01653
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED ANOMALOUS AND INAPPROPRIATE USE OF SENIOR CITIZENS' PHILHEALTH INSURANCE FUNDS ON CRUDE EYE OPERATIONS PERFORMED ON GROUPS OF SENIOR CITIZENS THAT RESULTED IN THE BLINDNESS AND/OR DETERIORATING EYESIGHTS OF THESE SENIOR CITIZENS, AND TO DETERMINE THE ACCOUNTABILITY OF ERRING PUBLIC OFFICIALS AND PRIVATE INDIVIDUALS, INCLUDING THE ERRING PHILHEALTH OFFICIALS OF THE PREVIOUS AND PRESENT ADMINISTRATION
status: Pending with the Committee on GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY since 2018-02-21
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01653
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGED ANOMALOUS AND INAPPROPRIATE USE OF SENIOR CITIZENS' PHILHEALTH INSURANCE FUNDS ON CRUDE EYE OPERATIONS PERFORMED ON GROUPS OF SENIOR CITIZENS THAT RESULTED IN THE BLINDNESS AND/OR DETERIORATING EYESIGHTS OF THESE SENIOR CITIZENS, AND TO DETERMINE THE ACCOUNTABILITY OF ERRING PUBLIC OFFICIALS AND PRIVATE INDIVIDUALS, INCLUDING THE ERRING PHILHEALTH OFFICIALS OF THE PREVIOUS AND PRESENT ADMINISTRATION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DATOL, FRANCISCO JR. G.
DATE FILED : 2018-02-06
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Lopez (M.L.) (000 2018-03-19)
